column3: Do I understand correctly that this change is actually useful only when running CI tasks locally?

> Do I understand correctly that this change is actually useful only when running CI tasks locally?

Correct. It is a convenience for those who change CI flow and want to verify locally.
Looks fragile, as this will fail to update `/ro_base` and probably break other stuff?

> Looks fragile, as this will fail to update `/ro_base` and probably break other stuff?

Yup, it would break `ro_base` and other more subtle stuff. I'll close this and re-think this concept. 
I do like re-using the container, it helped me speed up local verification/testing.
